basic.description:
A detailed analysis of French grammar based on the description of language structures.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Grammaire avancée

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A grade of B- in [FREN150 or (FREN101 and FREN102) or FREN100] or a grade of C in FREN110.
Exclusion     No more than 3 units from FREN250; FREN344.
